resources.string: The password is used to encrypt the private key, the strength is very important!\n wallet will not store the password, and can not help you find it, please remember!

The blockchain wallet is different from the traditional website account, which is a cryptographic-based decentralized account system. 

You must keep your wallet's private key and transaction password yourself, and any accidents will result in the loss of assets. 

We recommend doing a double backup first, then typing in a small amount of test, and then starting to use it
When you lose your wallet or forget your password, you can help restore it.
official wallet format, transaction password protected private key file
Digital Ecological Wisdom Home Based on Block Chain
Please click on the mnemonic in order to confirm that your backup mnemonic is correct.
The mnemonic is used to restore the wallet or reset the wallet password, copy it accurately onto paper, and store it in a safe place that only you know.
Please copy and paste the keystore file to a safe, offline place to save. Don\'t save to mailbox notepad, web disk, chat tool, etc., very dangerous
Do not save it to mailbox, notebook, Internet disk, chat tools, etc. It is very dangerous.
Do not transfer the keystore file through the network tool. Once it is acquired by the hacker, it will cause irreparable asset loss. It is recommended that offline devices be transmitted by QR code.
Do not transmit through network tools, once acquired by hackers, it will cause irreparable loss of assets. It is suggested that offline devices should be transmitted by two-dimensional code.
For online save, it is recommended to save the keystore with a password security software with a higher security level.
It is recommended to use password management tools to manage.
The QR code prohibits saving, screenshots, and taking photos. It is only for users to scan directly in a secure environment to facilitate the import of wallets.
Please use it if you are surrounded by no one and no camera. Once the QR code is acquired by others, it will cause irreparable loss of assets.

array.name: test1
array.item: , the following will not lead to the theft of your wallet:
. Others know your wallet address
. Others know your Keystore and unlock your Keystore password
. Others know your plaintext private key
. Others know your mnemonic

array.name: test2
array.item: , the following statement is correct:
.Be sure to make a wallet backup before upgrading the mobile phone system and APP version
. Uninstalling upgrades requires backup of the wallet, and coverage upgrades do not require backup
. After the wallet is lost, or the backup information is lost, contact customer service staff to help retrieve it
. Backup information is stored on the wallet server, so don\'t worry

array.name: test3
array.item: , which of the following backup methods is correct:
. Copy backup help words, ensure that the order of transcription is correct, clear copy, use spaces to separate each word, and keep the transcripts of the copy properly, such as in the safe
. Only backup mnemonics on mobile devices
. Only backup Keystore, no backup keystore password
. Back up only mnemonics on your mobile hard drive

array.name: test4
array.item: , when you use the wallet to transfer money, find yourself turning the wrong address, the following is correct?
. Because the blockchain has irreversible characteristics. So there is no way to cancel the transaction, and the wallet cannot withdraw the transaction
. Contact the official customer service staff at the first time to request cancellation of the transactiong
. Contact the official customer service staff for the first time and request to withdraw the successful transaction that has been sent
. Contact the official customer service staff at the first time to request to find out who the wrong transfer address is and contact the other party

array.name: test5
array.item: , if you create a new wallet, what do you need to do first?
. Back up your wallet immediately, including mnemonics and private keys
. Transfer transaction now
. Immediately copy the wallet address and remember the wallet password
. No special operations, just put it in the phone

array.name: test6
array.item: , If there is no backup wallet, which of the following statements is correct:
. This software is a decentralized wallet. If the private key is forgotten, it will lose all the assets in the wallet and will never be retrieved
. Can be retrieved via wallet address and transaction password
. The wallet will be retrieved by itself
. Can seek help from customer service staff

array.name: test7
array.item: , when you use the wallet, you find that there is a transfer record that is not your own operation. The following is correct:

. Realize that your private key may be leaked, stop using the wallet, immediately generate a new wallet, make a backup of the wallet, quickly transfer your Token to the new wallet, and then contact customer service staff
. Ask the customer service staff to freeze the account immediately
. Contact customer service staff at the first time
. Don\'t bother

array.name: what_list_content
array.item: consists of 256-bit random characters and is the core of the user\'s own and use of digital tokens.

conforms to the blockchain BIP39 industry standard and consists of 12 (or 15/18/21/24) ordered words generated by a random algorithm. It is an easy-to-record expression of the private key, which is convenient for users to backup and keep.
is a file format in which the private key or mnemonic is encrypted by the user-set wallet password. It is stored only on your mobile device and will not be synchronized to the company\'s server.

On a public chain, anyone can read and write data. Reading data is free, but writing data to the public chain costs a certain amount of money, which helps prevent garbage content and protect its security by paying for it. Any node on the network (each connection device that contains a copy of the account is called a node) can participate in a way called mining to protect the network. Because mining requires computing power and electricity, the miners need to be paid for their services, which is also the origin of the miners\'fees.
refers to the types of digital tokens currently supported by Walt, including but not limited to BTC, ETH, USDP, HTDF, etc.
refers to the inbox where users can receive information or notifications from the company.
For digital tokens supported by Walt, you can use Walt to generate a new wallet or import a compatible wallet generated by other wallet tools of the relevant blockchain system.

You can use Walt\'s transfer and collection functions to manage digital tokens, that is, use the private key for electronic signatures and modify the ledger of the relevant blockchain. Transfer means that the payer uses the payee\'s domain name or blockchain address for the transfer operation, which involves a valid record of the transaction in the distributed ledger of the relevant blockchain system (rather than actually on Walt) Deliver or transfer digital tokens).
Transfer This error may be caused by blockchain congestion. Transfer timeout does not mean transfer failure. For more information on this transaction, please visit Etherscan https://etherscan.io/.

First confirm whether the payment address filled in the transfer is the exchange address, personal address or smart contract address. Because all transfer transactions happen on the blockchain, once the transaction is completed, there is no way to modify the blockchain data to withdraw or cancel the transaction, and the token can only be transferred back by the recipient. 
 If you fill in the address of the exchange, then all the tokens you transferred have been transferred to the exchange's wallet address, please contact the exchange customer service, let them transfer your misdirected token back to your wallet. 
 If you are filling in a personal address, you can contact the other party to return the token. If you can't get the personal information of the holder of the currency address, there is no way to transfer the token back. 
 If you are filling out a smart contract address, please contact the contract developer to return your token. 
 It is recommended to carefully confirm the correctness of the receipt address and avoid asset loss before initiating the transfer transaction.

Wallet loss has the following four cases: 
 1. When the user deletes the wallet, there is no backup wallet. 
 We recommend that users back up their wallets immediately after creating their wallets, using both dual backup and multiple backup strategies. Double backup refers to keystore backup and mnemonic backup, multiple backup refers to backup of keystore After the mnemonic and the mnemonic, verify that the backup is correct, repeat the verification, and confirm that it is correct. 
 2. The user has forgotten the Keystore password
 We recommend that users encrypt the Keystore with a stronger password. This password is preferably a random, non-common password generated by the user. 
 3. Lost private key
 The private key here includes mnemonic, keystore and plaintext private key. Some users do not verify after copying the mnemonic, or they are too scribbled, which makes it difficult to identify later. These will lead to the inability to find your own wallet. Therefore, we must be careful when backing up the wallet. When you keep your wallet in the future, you should be good at using some secure management tools to ensure that you can find the private key at any time. 
 4. Back up the wrong wallet
 Backing up the wrong wallet means that the user has two wallets in Walt, for example, one is the A wallet and the other is the B wallet. When the user wants to back up the A wallet, it is backed up incorrectly. The private key of the wallet. Therefore, we recommend that after you back up your wallet, be sure to import the backup private key into your wallet to verify that the backup is correct.

First, realize that your private key may be leaked, replace your wallet immediately, and make a wallet backup. Then, quickly transfer the assets of your wallet to the new wallet. And check out the situation where you may reveal your private key
You can add, store or remove digital tokens (except ETH and BTC) supported by Walt from the Walt operator interface.
We will copy all or part of your transaction history through the blockchain system. However, the user should take the latest transaction record of the blockchain system as the standard.

In the decentralized wallet, all users\' authentication content, such as transaction password, private key, and mnemonic, are stored locally on the user\'s mobile phone and are not stored in the centralized server. All users forget the password. Third party agencies to reset.

refers to some of the Walt software code that the company publicly announces open source, allowing developers to use (including secondary development) the part of the open source code in compliance with the relevant open source agreement and the notice of the company.

Mnemonic words need to be used in conjunction with paths, and the same mnemonic words can generate different addresses in conjunction with different paths. Walt\'s HTDF default path is m\'44\'346\'0\'0, and USDP\'s default path is m\'44\'345\'0\'0. If you import mnemonics and want to change the path, a new wallet address will be generated. Be sure to remember your own path. If you set a custom path and then forget it when you import mnemonics, you may lose your wallet.

The 3.1.4 version starts using the standard BSV path m\'44\'346\'0\'0. The path of the old version is the same as that of the BCH. To recover the BSV assets of the old version of the asset, please use the BCH private key import to find.

resources.string: Enter token name or token contract address
Huate Wallet Mine Pool Program User Agreement

1, participation method and quota The mine pool plan only supports USDP/USDT point-to-point transfer to the specified address. The actual transfer amount, please refer to the page prompt. Reminder: Transfer to the designated official wallet address, if the address is wrong, the user is responsible for the loss. 
 2, the income rules T day transferred to participate in mining, one year after T+1 day to obtain double market value of HTDF. Example: On August 28, 2019, the user participated in mining with 10,000 USDP/USDT ($100 USD), and on August 29, 2020, the HTDF with double market value ($20,000) was obtained. 
 3. Participation in mining This product is limited to users who have reached the age of 18 and have civil capacity. Before participating, they must complete registration and real-name certification in Walter Wallet. The mining pool is planned to be based on 1000 USDP/USDT (minimum 1000 pieces). The details of the actual activity page are subject to the details. This activity is irrevocable after its participation. 
 4. Start calculating the income. The income is calculated on the day after the successful participation in the mining pool plan. If the participation fails, the participating USDP/USDT will be returned to the wallet address on the same day. 
 5, due settlement with a natural year as the settlement cycle, that is, T day transfer, one year after T+1 settlement. HTDF settles at 9:00 am on the Hetbi Exchange on the settlement date. The settlement completion user can transfer the acquired HTDF to the Hetbi exchange and continue to participate in the mining activities. 
 6. Withdrawal from participation in the mining pool During the planning period, if the user proposes a mandatory withdrawal plan without expiration, the service agreement refers to the automatic loss of legal effect, and the user must bear the penalty of 20% of the subscribed assets. This agreement is terminated.

resources.string: Note: HRC token transfers must execute smart contracts. Each execution requires the consumption of part of the HTDF.If the miner fee is insufficient, the miner fee will be deducted after the broadcast fails.The miner fee is the maximum acceptable miner fee, not the actual miner fee.
Are you sure you want to initiate an application for decommissioning?\n You will no longer enjoy the entrusted income after the entrusted relationship is released, please proceed with caution
After the application for decommissioning is approved, the HTDF delegated to the node needs to be clicked and extracted in the delegation record before it can be credited
Please enter the number of applications
The number of applications must be greater than 1
Application for detrust cannot exceed %s HTDF
A maximum of 7 orders can be taken at the same time for withdrawal of non-arrival orders. If the order is exceeded, the withdrawal will fail and you need to wait for the completion of other orders.

Please wait patiently for the node administrator to review. After the review is passed, click Extract in the entrusted record. After the extraction is completed, the entrusted HTDF can be credited to the account.
Note: The commissioned HTDF will take about 2 weeks to arrive
Gas limit must be greater than or equal to 21000
Gas price must be greater than %s

It is expected that Walt wallet will close the transfer service of HET, USDP, BEI old chain after September 15, 2020 Singapore time. At present, Walt wallet already supports HRC20-HET, HRC20-USDP, HRC20-BEI token transfer. \n If you hold HET, USDP, BEI old chain coins in Walt wallet, you can transfer the old chain coins to Hetbi Exchange (www.hetbi.me) and exchange them for HRC20-HET, HRC20-USDP, HRC20-BEI Singapore dollar. When operating HRC20 type token transfer, please select the HRC20 chain type for transaction. The replacement of HRC20 tokens will last for three months, and the deadline is September 15.
